<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Error Log Report"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/receiver/payment/report/logs"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Endpoint to generate a report containing an error log for payment initiation endpoints. The log will return all information about what provider endpoint returned an error, along with request and response information, everything needed to open a ticket in the open finance service desk.

This endpoint receives a Payment Consent PactualId or a Payment Initiation PactualId. After calling it, a report will be generated asynchronously, and a download link will be sent via webhook  ([OBK Report Webhook](https://developer.btgpactual.com/docbk#operation/receiver-payment-webhook)). To download it, do a GET request to the download link, using a token. The download link has a 60 seconds expiration,  after that time another report must be generated.

Obs: this endpoint is exclusive for customers using their own Open Finance license. 

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
